data.lyric:
[ti:drivers license (Explicit)]
[ar:Olivia Rodrigo]
[al:drivers license (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]drivers license (Explicit) - Olivia Rodrigo
[00:02.96]Lyrics by：Daniel Nigro/Olivia Rodrigo
[00:05.92]Composed by：Daniel Nigro/Olivia Rodrigo
[00:08.89]I got my driver's license last week
[00:12.23]Just like we always talked about
[00:15.39]'Cause you were so excited for me
[00:18.71]To finally drive up to your house
[00:22.00]But today I drove through the suburbs
[00:25.18]Crying 'cause you weren't around
[00:32.23]And you're probably with that blonde girl
[00:35.42]Who always made me doubt
[00:38.75]She's so much older than me
[00:41.40]She's everything I'm insecure about
[00:44.78]Yeah today I drove through the suburbs
[00:48.60]'Cause how could I ever love someone else
[00:54.67]And I know we weren't perfect but I've never felt this way for no one
[01:04.60]And I just can't imagine how you could be so okay now that I'm gone
[01:14.71]Guess you didn't mean what you wrote in that song about me
[01:21.61]'Cause you said forever now I drive alone past your street
[01:29.09]And all my friends are tired
[01:31.79]Of hearing how much I miss you but
[01:35.43]I kinda feel sorry for them
[01:38.04]'Cause they'll never know you the way that I do yeah
[01:41.67]Today I drove through the suburbs
[01:44.86]And pictured I was driving home to you
[01:51.36]And I know we weren't perfect but I've never felt this way for no one oh-oh
[02:01.62]And I just can't imagine how you could be so okay now that I'm gone
[02:10.78]I guess you didn't mean what you wrote in that song about me
[02:18.12]'Cause you said forever now I drive alone past your street
[02:24.79]Red lights stop signs
[02:28.02]I still see your face in the white cars front yards
[02:34.57]Can't drive past the places we used to go to
[02:41.21]'Cause I still f**kin' love you babe
[02:46.31]Ooh ooh-ooh ooh-ooh ooh-ooh
[02:51.48]Sidewalks we crossed
[02:54.72]I still hear your voice in the traffic we're laughing
[03:01.18]Over all the noise
[03:04.42]God I'm so blue know we're through
[03:07.92]But I still f**kin' love you babe
[03:12.95]Ooh ooh-ooh ooh-ooh ooh-ooh
[03:18.34]I know we weren't perfect but I've never felt this way for no one
[03:28.13]And I just can't imagine how you could be so okay now that I'm gone
[03:38.13]'Cause you didn't mean what you wrote in that song about me
[03:44.70]'Cause you said forever now I drive alone past your street
[03:51.57]Yeah you said forever now I drive alone past your street
data.trans:
[ti:drivers license (Explicit)]
[ar:Olivia Rodrigo]
[al:drivers license (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.96]//
[00:05.92]//
[00:08.89]我上周拿到我的驾照
[00:12.23]就像我们经常说的那样
[00:15.39]因为你会为我感到高兴
[00:18.71]我终于可以驾车来到你家
[00:22.00]可今天 我驾车路过郊外
[00:25.18]我泪如雨下 因为你不在我身边
[00:32.23]你可能跟那个金发女孩在一起
[00:35.42]她总是让我心生疑虑
[00:38.75]她比我大几岁
[00:41.40]她就是我惴惴不安的症结所在
[00:44.78]今天 我驾车路过郊外
[00:48.60]我怎么可能会爱上别人
[00:54.67]我知道我们并不完美 可我从未对任何人有过这样的感觉
[01:04.60]我只是无法想象你对我的离开竟然无动于衷
[01:14.71]我想你为我写的那首歌并非出自真心
[01:21.61]因为你曾许诺过永远 如今我形单影只 驾车驶过你家门前的道路
[01:29.09]我所有朋友都听腻了
[01:31.79]我有多么思念你
[01:35.43]我为他们感到遗憾
[01:38.04]因为他们无法像我一样了解你
[01:41.67]今天 我驾车路过郊外
[01:44.86]想象着我开车回家去找你
[01:51.36]我知道我们并不完美 可我从未对任何人有过这样的感觉
[02:01.62]我只是无法想象你对我的离开竟然无动于衷
[02:10.78]我想你为我写的那首歌并非出自真心
[02:18.12]因为你曾许诺过永远 如今我形单影只 驾车驶过你家门前的道路
[02:24.79]红灯信号 停止标志
[02:28.02]我依然能在白色汽车里 前院里看见你的脸庞
[02:34.57]我不能驾车经过我们以前常去的地方
[02:41.21]因为我依然深爱着你 宝贝
[02:46.31]//
[02:51.48]我们曾经走过的人行道
[02:54.72]我依然能在络绎不绝的车流里听见你的声音 我们欢声笑语
[03:01.18]忽略所有嘈杂
[03:04.42]上帝啊我伤心不已 我知道我们已经分手
[03:07.92]可我依然深爱着你 宝贝
[03:12.95]//
[03:18.34]我知道我们并不完美 可我从未对任何人有过这样的感觉
[03:28.13]我只是无法想象你对我的离开竟然无动于衷
[03:38.13]因为你为我写的那首歌并非出自真心
[03:44.70]因为你曾许诺过永远 如今我形单影只 驾车驶过你家门前的道路
[03:51.57]你曾许诺过永远 如今我形单影只 驾车驶过你家门前的道路
